meaning_str.bing:
n. 国家；民族；国民
网络. 国族；民族国家；国家民族

国族；民族国家；国家民族

国家；民族；国民；国度；（美洲土著居民的）部落

1.en: We Irish are too poetical to be poets; we are a nation of brilliant failures, but we are the greatest talkers since the Greeks.
1.cn: 我们爱尔兰人太诗意以至不能做诗人，我们是才华横溢的失败者的国度，可我们是自希腊人以来最伟大的讲演者

2.en: At this point it's hard to see how the nation can escape from this death spiral into default.
2.cn: 目前，很难看到这个国家如何才能逃脱滑向债务违约的死亡螺旋。

3.en: In a short speech, he said the Communist Party was "realising the rejuvenation of the Chinese nation" .
3.cn: 他在简短的讲话中表示，共产党正在“实现中华民族伟大复兴”。

0.en: A symbol to the nation. A hero to the world.
0.cn: 他是国家的象征，世界的英雄。

1.en: We're a nation of more than 300 million people.
1.cn: 我们是一个有着超过3亿国民的国家。

2.en: We now turn to the hostile nation of North Korea.
2.cn: 我们把目光放到敌对国家北朝鲜上。

3.en: We are a nation of immigrants. It has always given America a big advantage over other nations.
3.cn: 我们是一个移民国家，这总能给美国带来比其他国家更大的优势。

4.en: And on Tuesday, I called on every nation developed and developing alike to join us in this effort for the sake of future generations.
4.cn: 在周二，我呼吁每一个国家不管是发达国家，还是发展中国家，加入我们致力于为了子孙后代的努力。

5.en: Tensions between your nation and South Korea are at an all-time high.
5.cn: 你的国家和南韩之间一直保持着紧张的局势。

6.en: America makes more weaponry than every other nation on earth by far.
6.cn: 美国制造了更多的武器，比世界上任何一个国家都多。

7.en: And how does a nation of nearly 1.4 billion people work and play?
7.cn: 还有，一个具有将近十四亿人口的国家是如何工作和娱乐的？

8.en: China's vast and varied land has helped shape a nation and its people.
8.cn: 中国得广袤土地囊括万象，孕育了这个国家，养育了它的人民。

9.en: Oh, yeah. Speaking of cowboys, do you know what country has not one but two cows on its flag? The tiny landlocked nation of Andorra.
9.cn: 太他妈爽了。说到牛仔，知道哪个国家的国旗印着两只牛吗？内陆小国家，安道尔共和国。

10.en: This is imperative for you, as an individual, and for our success as a nation.
10.cn: 各位作为社会的一员，这种认知对于你自己和国家的兴盛都是必要的。

11.en: As a nation, as Americans to serve them as well as they have always served us.
11.cn: 作为一个国家，作为美国人，服务于他们正如他们一直服务于我们一样。

12.en: When our veterans have the opportunity to succeed, our whole nation is stronger.
12.cn: 当我们的退伍军人拥有了成功的机会，我们整个国家会变得更加强大。

13.en: We're lucky that our nation has such vast energy resources, but how long before that luck runs out?
13.cn: 我们很幸运我们国家有大量的能源，但这幸运能维持多久？

14.en: Despite whatever you may have heard, America is actually the number-one manufacturing nation on earth.
14.cn: 除了这些你听说过的，美国是地球上最大的制造业国家。

15.en: I believe our nation's tuna cans are safe. Excuse me. Dr. Greene, question? Yes?
15.cn: 我觉得咱国家的金枪鱼罐头还是安全的，抱歉等下聊，格林博士，我能提问吗？请讲。

16.en: Because I believe that we are strongest as a nation when the President and Congress work together.
16.cn: 因为我相信，当总统和国会通力合作的时候，我们国家将无比强大。

17.en: After pupating in our nation's railway system, I've burst forth as the world's smartest butterfly.
17.cn: 在咱们国家铁路网上化蛹后，我破茧而出，变成了全世界最聪明的蝴蝶。

18.en: Around the country, kids rely on a half-million-member army of transportation experts, the nation's school bus drivers.
18.cn: 整个国家的孩子都依靠这50万公交专家，这些学校的巴士司机。

19.en: It doesn't matter if you're a Democrat. It doesn't matter if you're a Republican. Our nation needs you to vote today.
19.cn: 不管你是民主党人，还是共和党人。我们的国家需要你们今天的投票。
